title: Shall I ask?
lines: Shall I ask you one thing I seek?
Shall I open my heart to speak?
Let my tears fall on your cheek.
I'm asking for you...

title: Will you say?
lines: You are my angel, between sky and sand,
A seed in my heart, where roots expand.
A tale of war what the time demand.
Just for a dew, who bloom on the land—

title: For that she would come
lines: For that she would come...
To stop yearning aloud,
My heart remained a never pouring cloud,
And so my pain—a flame never kept as vowed.

title: Days without you
lines: Life.. Love.. can't exist without you...
World.. Feel.. won't separate from you...
Sky and.. My mind.. are God's way of long...
Beauty and.. Land.. was the pain in my song...

title: In a breeze of
lines: In a breeze of garden with thousands of flowers..
I searched as alone for the fragnance of yours..
A drop that mixed with the sea..
Was the one I'm searching for me..

title: As you came like a Rain
lines: As you came like a Rain..
Eyes wished you're Main..
Love is filling eyes in Pain..
Life is killing heart's strain..

title: You are the magic
lines: You're the Moisture burning me..
You're the Nature of raining sea..
You're the Winter weakening me..
You're the hunter who killing me..

title: In my gene
lines: In my gene...  Dreamt a scene... With your mean...
Closed my eyes... Wandered in lies...  Searched for a rise...
Today, the life will bond with you,
A day, tears are looking for a new..
